title: Replace Download Bill with html2pdf.js PDF generation

requirements.text: Replace the current plain-text file download logic in the 'Download Bill' button (App.tsx) with PDF generation using the html2pdf.js library. When clicked, the button should capture the bill content area (customer name, items table, subtotal, GST, grand total) and download it as a PDF file named 'zweeti-bill.pdf'. The button must remain hidden during print. Load html2pdf.js via npm package or CDN import compatible with the existing React/Vite build setup.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Download Bill' generates and downloads a PDF file named 'zweeti-bill.pdf'.
The downloaded PDF contains the customer name, all bill items with price and quantity, subtotal, GST (5%), and grand total.
html2pdf.js is used for PDF generation.
The 'Download Bill' button is not visible when the browser print dialog is triggered.
No plain-text .txt file is downloaded; only the PDF output is produced.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/main.tsx.
Do not change the existing visual theme (orange #ff5722, grey #f2f2f2 background, white card, dashed borders).
Do not alter menu items or billing calculation logic.
nonGoals: Adding new menu items or changing existing ones.
Changing the Print Bill button behavior.
